help: Unlocks a specified fleet ability such as Transverse Jump or Neutrino Detector.
Prints your hidden Guilt score and if your Guilt is attracting undue attention.
Increases (or decreases) your hidden Guilt score. If no amount is specified, adds 1 Guilt.
Adds the starting Guilt, story flag and extra skill point from the Haunted start/background. Add a "false" after the command to skip the skill point.

Toggles the "NPC Only" tag on a skill (e.g "helmsmanship") or aptitude (e.g "aptitude_combat"), revealing (or hiding) it within the player's skill menu. Persists between saves and resets on game load. Use with care. May not function properly as of 0.96a.
Levels up Sierra, your AI companion, from 6-7 or 7-8. Requires SoTF's Watcher Beyond the Walls module to be active.
Reveals the star system of a secret SoTF entity or encounter if it exists. Valid arguments: "athena", "hypnos", "inky", "mia"

Executes a SotF test command. These aren't really meant for your use. Valid arguments: "hatred", "sierraAtrocity", "sendWendigo", "sendWendigoHostile", "hallowhallPoints", "hallowhallPoints+", "wsRevMeal"
